name: Perkier Naturally
description: I produce beautiful artisanal botanical soaps in small batches, using quality ingredients from sustainable sources. No minimum spend, no delivery charges. The soaps come beautifully packaged in slim, letterbox friendly boxes (recycled and recyclable).
